trans-unit.source: Control that is used to separate items in items controls.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som används för att separera objekt i objekt-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A Separator control draws a line, horizontal or vertical, between items in controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: En avgränsare kontroll ritar en rad, vågrätt eller lodrätt, mellan objekt i kontroller som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Separator controls do not react to any keyboard, mouse, mouse wheel, or tablet input and cannot be enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: Avgränsare kontroller reagerar på inte alla tangentbord, mus, mushjulet eller tablet indata och inte kan aktiveras eller markerad.

trans-unit.source: Separator controls inside <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> elements appear differently from Separator controls outside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Avgränsare kontroller i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>element visas annorlunda än avgränsare kontroller utanför <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> with a Separator, the control automatically applies the <xref:System.Windows.Style> identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>med en avgränsare kontrollen använder automatiskt de <xref:System.Windows.Style>identifieras av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Styles are placed in resource dictionaries and are searched for by their keys.
trans-unit.target: Formatmallar placeras i resursordlistor och genomsöks efter av sina nycklar.

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a Separator inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to create your new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Ändra <xref:System.Windows.Style>avgränsarens inuti en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>måste du använda <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap för att skapa ditt nya <xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Separator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Separator"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Ger en lämplig <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering för den här kontrollen som en del av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation-infrastruktur.
